Who: LEGACY, Tuscon, Perceptor, Talon, Straight Shot, Quickstride
Location: Deep Earth caverns not far from the Black Fortress

> Tucson waits for the insect's answer as his engine idols with a loud rumbling noise of a typical truck.

The insect's appear to ignore Perceptor and Tuscon's questions, their
only response is to leap forward, their wings flipping open for a
moment and buzzing, "Intruders." they said in unison their voices
raspy,   "They must be brought to the mistress!"

Two of them leap forward in an attempt to land on land on Tuscon's
hood even as the others moved quickly around the sides, three on the
left and two on the right, their armored bodies sliding easily between
Tuscon and the tunnel walls on either side.

OOC: Sandy, Airly, would it be easier for you guys if I GM'ed the
hits/misses/results of these encounters to keep us on the same sheet
of music?

Preston
